Articles.Content:
On 7/6/2020 at 6:47 PM, R-T-B said:

shaders

Hello. About KopEX - footprints from your recompile. It mostly works, but the footprint itself is just a rectangle. 

GEP Primary, Kopernicus 1.9.1 - 3, high terrain shader, 100% textures, no scatterer. And thank you for all that work with Kopernicus!

3 hours ago, Hohmannson said:

Hello. About KopEX - footprints from your recompile. It mostly works, but the footprint itself is just a rectangle. 

GEP Primary, Kopernicus 1.9.1 - 3, high terrain shader, 100% textures, no scatterer. And thank you for all that work with Kopernicus!

Hmm, can I get a log from when this occured?  Even if it has no errors, it could help me diagnose.  A savegame for bonus points...  Report much appreciated either way!

8 hours ago, Ace76inDC said:

Thanks everyone for continuing this mod.  It's absolutely great and love seeing the community come together.

If you'd told me last month I'd be responsible for maintaining Kopernicus, even only in part, I'd have told you you were crazy.  To be frank, Kopernicus is just a huge project I didn't think I was smart enough to grasp!  But necessity sometimes drives innovation...  This is one such case, I'd argue.  We didn't want a world without Kopernicus, so we made it happen.

Edited July 8, 2020 by R-T-B
waiting patiently for this to work with RSS!;  I'm jaded.  I briefly got it work with 1.8-1, but steam updated, and i couldn't get the right version of kopernicus.

1 hour ago, kurtwithk said:

waiting patiently for this to work with RSS!;  I'm jaded.  I briefly got it work with 1.8-1, but steam updated, and i couldn't get the right version of kopernicus.

I believe the present release for 1.9 should work with RSS ok, the worst bug is a flawed implementation of atmospheric temp calculations.  That should be fixed next release.  Still, we won't support CKAN until it is 100% stable though, which won't be long with any luck.  We're getting closer everyday.

Edited July 8, 2020 by R-T-B

2 hours ago, R-T-B said:

Hmm, can I get a log from when this occured?

Well, literally nothing strange about footprints in logs, as i see, but here they are. https://yadi.sk/d/lO5QbclQuhHpTg . Not sure if it will be in English, if not, press white button СКАЧАТЬ, that means "Download".

2 hours ago, Hohmannson said:

Well, literally nothing strange about footprints in logs, as i see, but here they are. https://yadi.sk/d/lO5QbclQuhHpTg . Not sure if it will be in English, if not, press white button СКАЧАТЬ, that means "Download".

Yeah, you are correct.  The logs are clean as can be.  It seems to me the KopEx shader must be out of date, which is unfortunate, because I have no idea how to rebuild them.  There is no documentation on it either.

If anyone knows more about this, please:

On 7/6/2020 at 9:40 PM, coyotesfrontier said:

Maybe something would be helpful in this situation, for the mod devs. Can you guess what it is?

oh yeah, my bad...

here it is https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1f2qzRmQvAP8yhtGi2tbZPyxQVAz_jeIS

Edited July 8, 2020 by Not a Spy

I don't have access to that logfile.  My best bet without it would be some kind of mod conflict, or you are replacing the dll files manually without the rest of the cfg files (you should delete the kopernicus folder between beta releases, really).

13 hours ago, kurtwithk said:

waiting patiently for this to work with RSS!;  I'm jaded.  I briefly got it work with 1.8-1, but steam updated, and i couldn't get the right version of kopernicus.

You know you can revert versions on steam right?

3 hours ago, Hpl said:

You know you can revert versions on steam right?

Yes I do.  I suspect I keep getting the wrong texture pack (keeps trying to load).  Any ideas would be much appreciated!

12 hours ago, R-T-B said:

I don't have access to that logfile.  My best bet without it would be some kind of mod conflict, or you are replacing the dll files manually without the rest of the cfg files (you should delete the kopernicus folder between beta releases, really).

how do i give you acces?
Does Kopernicus have dependencies, I can't find the 1.8.1 forum thread to find out what they are.
Modulemanager and modularflightintegrator
they are included and I have them installed but kopernicus isn't loading

Are you sure you are doing it correctly?

what kopernicus and ksp version are you using?

what planet pack are you trying to load

Drop the kopernicus folder into game data along with module flight integrator and module manager 4.1.3

i am using version 1.9

i am not loading a planet pack im trying to get tantares working but it requires kopernicus for the solar panels
Send logs

this is kopernicus.log
No, don’t do that, post the log in another site (ie.dropbox) and post the link here, the forum doesn’t like textwalls

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1KCDi0WGpF60wVNQscdUd06wfDI79DomP?usp=sharing

here is my whole log folder
Kopernicus is working i forgot to install another part of tantares
I have been using Kopernicus 1.9.1-3 with the  Beyond Home mod so far I havent had any major problems, just random floating rocks and trees.

I encountered some floating trees on Kerbin.  1.9.1  Kopernicus 1.9.3.  My log file says it's too big to read so I can't do any troubleshooting for myself to know if it's kopernicus or one of my other hundred or so mods, so I'll just watch what's posted here for the time being and upload if asked.  If I can manage, I'll get a screenshot for you in a bit.  It just started happening, and I've had Kopernicus 1.9.3 since it dropped...... lol

On 7/7/2020 at 7:07 PM, Hohmannson said:

Hello. About KopEX - footprints from your recompile. It mostly works, but the footprint itself is just a rectangle. 

GEP Primary, Kopernicus 1.9.1 - 3, high terrain shader, 100% textures, no scatterer. And thank you for all that work with Kopernicus!

what mod adds the boot prints?

Ok, I just encountered another issue.  2 actually.  But then upon reverting from 1.9.3 KOP, to 1.9.1 it fixed the issue.  Seems to be something that changes the depth of the surface, as flags on kerbin (not sure on other planets as I didn't take the time to check) as well as structures change location dramatically in height, either up, or down.  I had flags suddenly inside the planet.  lol. 

This object was discovered floating above my launch pad.   I colided with it, my ship blew up it remained.  Exiting KSP and starting back up fixed it.  Above

This is how it should look, Kopernicus 1.9.1 above.

Floating trees?  Kopernicus 1.9.3 above

Flags displaced do not get fixed on exiting and loading back up Kopernicus 1.9.3.  1.9.1 Kopernicus no problems.
